1.a: It is a membrane-bound organelle found in plant as well as animal cells
1.b: It is also called the suicidal bag of the cell
1.c: It helps in the synthesis of protein
1.d: It acts as a dispatch station of protein products received from the endoplasmic reticulum (ER)

1: It acts as a dispatch station of protein products received from the endoplasmic reticulum (ER)
